channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump again threatens Harvard's tax-exempt status, saying, 'It's what they deserve!'
item.description: Trump's comments on social media marked the latest volley in a battle between the administration and the wealthiest college in the world.

item.title: The U.S. job market cooled slightly as Trump's trade war heated up
item.description: U.S. employers added 177,000 jobs in April — a modest slowdown from the previous month, while the unemployment rate held steady at 4.2%.

item.title: Justice Department sues Hawaii, Michigan over plans to sue fossil fuel companies for climate harm
item.description: The Justice Department is suing two states over their planned lawsuits against fossil fuel companies for harms caused by climate change.
